title: Remember When: TVNZ U was the best youth channel of all time
content:encoded:
It harnessed the power of a new website called "Facebook" and it helped launch the careers of our brightest comedy stars in Rose Matafeo and Guy Montgomery, so why did TVNZ pull the plug on TVNZ U? Join us as we remember the most chaotic and groundbreaking youth channel the country has ever seen.


Join the Real Pod community!

Join The Real Pod Corner on Facebook

Join our Discord server

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
